name: Chirpy the Penguin Collection
description:
NOTE: THESE ARE NOT MY GAMES. I AM UPLOADING THEM BECAUSE YOU SHOULD CHECK THEM OUT.

Welcome to the home of Chirpy games! Access any canon Chirpy game. The creator recommends you play them in order. (not the order in the timeline, the order of release.) 

Chirpy the Penguin or Chirpy the Penguin Deluxe: Chirpy's Story

Chirpy the Penguin 2 

Chirpy the Penguin 3

Chirpy the Penguin Deluxe: Evil Chirpy's Story (NOTE: This takes place at the same time as Chirpy the Penguin)

Chirpy 4: Part 1 & Part 2

Chirpy Reverie

But I think you should play in chronological order

Have fun!
